title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: e-Learning Project-Based Training for Public Health Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific and Health Concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain public health fundamentals (e.g., infectious disease control, health promotion) and apply them to real-world cases
Learners can design projects solving hypothetical public health issues (e.g., community health disparities) using data analysis tools
Learners can communicate with peers through a collaborative platform to co-create project deliverables and finalize presentation materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
